meaningMnemonic: If a 原子 is an <kanji>atom</kanji> and a 炉 is a <kanji>furnace</kanji>, what is a furnace that has atoms? It is an <vocabulary>atomic reactor</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>nuclear reactor</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
